title: Riots Web Design Team needs a Good Random Performace Assessment with this poor coding...
body:
Try typing in the less than sign and then any text proceeding it.

Like this:
The amount of brains the Web Design team with this flaw is:

EDIT: LESSTHAN 1
Not trying to be a dick but comon...

replies.body:
< This is the character of Alt+6+0
So, you can use 'Alt+6+0' to get < but you cant use 'Shift+,' to get the regular Lessthan Sign

>This is the Alt+6+2 morethan sign

>but if i use the regular morethan sign here, i should get it in a block quote

Looks like both the 'Alt+6+2' code and the regular 'shift+.' Both count as Quote marks

< lets test by copy pasting your less than sign

and below ill use mine here:
Ok, let's see < how this works.
